item.title: Counting non-intersecting double-diagonals in polygons

Discussion at // https://github.com/mojombo/jekyll/issues/199 var all = MathJax.Hub.getAllJax(), i; for(i = 0; i A friend told me recently he was solving a problem about polygons.
